text: Jiaru ta [di sanci xuanbu] xiule ta [ji lihun dehua shuole san ci], name, cihou ta dui ta shi bu hefa de [ta buke zai zuo ta de qizi], zhidao ta jia gei lingwai yi wei zhangfu. Jiaru zhe wei zhangfu [hou fu] xiule ta, name, ta yu qianfu fuhun, dui ta lia shi wu zui de, ruguo ta lia renwei ta lia neng zunshou an la de fadu. Zhe shi an la de fadu. Ta wei you zhishi de minzhong chanming ta.
